00020   using namespace std;
00021 
00022   const string DMS::hemispheres = "SNWE";
00023   const string DMS::signs = "-+";
00024   const string DMS::digits = "0123456789";
00025   const string DMS::dmsindicators = "D'\"";
00026   const string DMS::components[] = {"degrees", "minutes", "seconds"};
00027 
00028   Math::real DMS::Decode(const std::string& dms, flag& ind) {
00029     int sign = 1;
00030     unsigned
00031       beg = 0,
00032       end = unsigned(dms.size());
00033     while (beg < end && isspace(dms[beg]))
00034       ++beg;
00035     while (beg < end && isspace(dms[end - 1]))
00036       --end;
00037     flag ind1 = NONE;
00038     int k = -1;
00039     if (end > beg && (k = lookup(hemispheres, dms[beg])) >= 0) {
00040       ind1 = (k / 2) ? LONGITUDE : LATITUDE;
00041       sign = k % 2 ? 1 : -1;
00042       ++beg;
00043     }
00044     if (end > beg && (k = lookup(hemispheres, dms[end-1])) >= 0) {
00045       if (k >= 0) {
00046         if (ind1 != NONE) {
00047           if (toupper(dms[beg - 1]) == toupper(dms[end - 1]))
00048             throw GeographicErr("Repeated hemisphere indicators "
00049                                 + str(dms[beg - 1]) + " in "
00050                                 + dms.substr(beg - 1, end - beg + 1));
00051           else
00052             throw GeographicErr("Contradictory hemisphere indicators "
00053                                 + str(dms[beg - 1]) + " and "
00054                                 + str(dms[end - 1]) + " in "
00055                                 + dms.substr(beg - 1, end - beg + 1));
00056         }
00057         ind1 = (k / 2) ? LONGITUDE : LATITUDE;
00058         sign = k % 2 ? 1 : -1;
00059         --end;
00060       }
00061     }
00062     if (end > beg && (k = lookup(signs, dms[beg])) >= 0) {
00063       if (k >= 0) {
00064         sign *= k ? 1 : -1;
00065         ++beg;
00066       }
00067     }
00068     if (end == beg)
00069       throw GeographicErr("Empty or incomplete DMS string " + dms);
00070     real ipieces[] = {0, 0, 0};
00071     real fpieces[] = {0, 0, 0};
00072     unsigned npiece = 0;
00073     real icurrent = 0;
00074     real fcurrent = 0;
00075     unsigned ncurrent = 0, p = beg;
00076     bool pointseen = false;
00077     unsigned digcount = 0;
00078     while (p < end) {
00079       char x = dms[p++];
00080       if ((k = lookup(digits, x)) >= 0) {
00081         ++ncurrent;
00082         if (digcount > 0)
00083           ++digcount;           // Count of decimal digits
00084         else
00085           icurrent = 10 * icurrent + k;
00086       } else if (x == '.') {
00087         if (pointseen)
00088           throw GeographicErr("Multiple decimal points in "
00089                               + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00090         pointseen = true;
00091         digcount = 1;
00092       } else if ((k = lookup(dmsindicators, x)) >= 0) {
00093         if (unsigned(k) == npiece - 1)
00094           throw GeographicErr("Repeated " + components[k]
00095                               + " component in " + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00096         else if (unsigned(k) < npiece)
00097           throw GeographicErr(components[k] + " component follows "
00098                               + components[npiece - 1] + " component in "
00099                               + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00100         if (ncurrent == 0)
00101           throw GeographicErr("Missing numbers in " + components[k]
00102                               + " component of " + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00103         if (digcount > 1) {
00104           istringstream s(dms.substr(p - digcount - 1, digcount));
00105           s >> fcurrent;
00106         }
00107         ipieces[k] = icurrent;
00108         fpieces[k] = icurrent + fcurrent;
00109         if (p < end) {
00110           npiece = k + 1;
00111           icurrent = fcurrent = 0;
00112           ncurrent = digcount = 0;
00113         }
00114       } else if (lookup(signs, x) >= 0)
00115         throw GeographicErr("Internal sign in DMS string "
00116                             + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00117       else
00118         throw GeographicErr("Illegal character " + str(x)
00119                             + " in DMS string "
00120                             + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00121     }
00122     if (lookup(dmsindicators, dms[p - 1]) < 0) {
00123       if (npiece >= 3)
00124         throw GeographicErr("Extra text following seconds in DMS string "
00125                             + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00126       if (ncurrent == 0)
00127         throw GeographicErr("Missing numbers in " + components[k]
00128                             + " component of " + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00129       if (digcount > 1) {
00130         istringstream s(dms.substr(p - digcount, digcount));
00131         s >> fcurrent;
00132       }
00133       ipieces[npiece] = icurrent;
00134       fpieces[npiece] = icurrent + fcurrent;
00135     }
00136     if (pointseen && digcount == 0)
00137       throw GeographicErr("Decimal point in non-terminal component of "
00138                           + dms.substr(beg, end - beg));
00139     // Note that we accept 59.999999... even though it rounds to 60.
00140     if (ipieces[1] >= 60)
00141       throw GeographicErr("Minutes " + str(fpieces[1])
00142                           + " not in range [0, 60)");
00143     if (ipieces[2] >= 60)
00144       throw GeographicErr("Seconds " + str(fpieces[2])
00145                           + " not in range [0, 60)");
00146     ind = ind1;
00147     // Assume check on range of result is made by calling routine (which might
00148     // be able to offer a better diagnostic).
00149     return real(sign) * (fpieces[0] + (fpieces[1] + fpieces[2] / 60) / 60);
00150   }
00151 
00152   void DMS::DecodeLatLon(const std::string& stra, const std::string& strb,
00153                          real& lat, real& lon) {
00154       real a, b;
00155       flag ia, ib;
00156       a = Decode(stra, ia);
00157       b = Decode(strb, ib);
00158       if (ia == NONE && ib == NONE) {
00159         // Default to lat, long
00160         ia = LATITUDE;
00161         ib = LONGITUDE;
00162       } else if (ia == NONE)
00163         ia = flag(LATITUDE + LONGITUDE - ib);
00164       else if (ib == NONE)
00165         ib = flag(LATITUDE + LONGITUDE - ia);
00166       if (ia == ib)
00167         throw GeographicErr("Both " + stra + " and "
00168                             + strb + " interpreted as "
00169                             + (ia == LATITUDE ? "latitudes" : "longitudes"));
00170       real
00171         lat1 = ia == LATITUDE ? a : b,
00172         lon1 = ia == LATITUDE ? b : a;
00173       if (! (lat1 >= -90 && lat1 <= 90))
00174         throw GeographicErr("Latitude " + str(lat1) + "d not in [-90d, 90d]");
00175       if (! (lon1 >= -180 && lon1 <= 360))
00176         throw GeographicErr("Latitude " + str(lon1)
00177                             + "d not in [-180d, 360d]");
00178       if (lon1 >= 180)
00179         lon1 -= 360;
00180       lat = lat1;
00181       lon = lon1;
00182   }
00183 
00184   string DMS::Encode(real angle, component trailing, unsigned prec, flag ind) {
00185     // Assume check on range of input angle has been made by calling
00186     // routine (which might be able to offer a better diagnostic).
00187     //
00188     // 15 - 2 * trailing = ceiling(log10(2^53/90/60^trailing)).
00189     // This suffices to give full real precision for numbers in [-90,90]
00190     prec = min(15 - 2 * unsigned(trailing), prec);
00191     real scale = 1;
00192     for (unsigned i = 0; i < unsigned(trailing); ++i)
00193       scale *= 60;
00194     for (unsigned i = 0; i < prec; ++i)
00195       scale *= 10;
00196     if (ind == AZIMUTH)
00197       angle -= floor(angle/360) * 360;
00198     int sign = angle < 0 ? -1 : 1;
00199     angle *= sign;
00200 
00201     // Break off integer part to preserve precision in manipulation of
00202     // fractional part.
00203     real
00204       idegree = floor(angle),
00205       fdegree = floor((angle - idegree) * scale + real(0.5)) / scale;
00206     if (fdegree >= 1) {
00207       idegree += 1;
00208       fdegree -= 1;
00209     }
00210     real pieces[3] = {fdegree, 0, 0};
00211     for (unsigned i = 1; i <= unsigned(trailing); ++i) {
00212       real
00213         ip = floor(pieces[i - 1]),
00214         fp = pieces[i - 1] - ip;
00215       pieces[i] = fp * 60;
00216       pieces[i - 1] = ip;
00217     }
00218     pieces[0] += idegree;
00219     ostringstream s;
00220     s << fixed  << setfill('0');
00221     if (ind == NONE && sign < 0)
00222       s << '-';
00223     switch (trailing) {
00224     case DEGREE:
00225       if (ind != NONE)
00226         s << setw(1 + min(int(ind), 2) + prec + (prec ? 1 : 0));
00227       s << setprecision(prec) << pieces[0];
00228       // Don't include degree designator (d) if it is the trailing component.
00229       break;
00230     default:
00231       if (ind != NONE)
00232         s << setw(1 + min(int(ind), 2));
00233       s << setprecision(0) << pieces[0] << char(tolower(dmsindicators[0]));
00234       switch (trailing) {
00235       case MINUTE:
00236         s << setw(2 + prec + (prec ? 1 : 0)) << setprecision(prec)
00237           << pieces[1] <<  char(tolower(dmsindicators[1]));
00238         break;
00239       case SECOND:
00240         s << setw(2) << pieces[1] <<  char(tolower(dmsindicators[1]))
00241           << setw(2 + prec + (prec ? 1 : 0)) << setprecision(prec)
00242           << pieces[2] <<  char(tolower(dmsindicators[2]));
00243         break;
00244       default:
00245         break;
00246       }
00247     }
00248     if (ind != NONE && ind != AZIMUTH)
00249       s << hemispheres[(ind == LATITUDE ? 0 : 2) + (sign < 0 ? 0 : 1)];
00250     return s.str();
00251   }
